lines.text: Lady, I come to sell you something you don't want.
What's the matter, Benny? You're lower than a caterpillar with fallen arches.
Do you mind if I have a piece of candy while I wait on you?
Aren't you worried you're going to wear your teeth down to the bones?
You ate three packages of cracker jacks, two bags of peanuts, one of those red gooey apples on a stick, and three chocolate malked milkshakes.
And don't forget the banana split, with a lot of fruit on it!
Don't tell me, let me guess, he took the shirt off your back.

[Benny insists 7 goes into 28 13 times, Chandler has him write 7 13s on a blackboard]
We'll add these up this time.
3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, 21. Now, if you can get 28 out of that, you have a job.
